name: Pink Cloud Rosewater + Squalane Makeup Removing Face Wash
about: What it is:A multitasking face wash that gently melts away makeup, removes impurities, and hydrates for clean, balanced skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dryness, and Redness.Formulation:Gel.Highlighted Ingredients:- Rose Hydrosol: Hydrates skin..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:This cleanser has a base of rose water and coconut water that leave skin looking soft and hydrated. It contains gentle, plant-based surfactants that lift dirt and oil without stripping moisture while vegan squalane removes makeup and superfood tremella mushroom provides hydration and jelly texture.
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Squalane, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citric Acid, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Tapioca Starch.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Use:.-Use twice daily in the morning and evening..-Apply one to two pumps of this high-efficiency formula to wet skin..-Massage in circular, upward motions on the face and neck for 30 seconds..-Rinse thoroughly...Recycling Instructions:.Place outer carton into paper recycling..Remove the label, rinse the glass bottle thoroughly, and recycle. .Unfortunately pumps cannot be recycled at this time due to their many mixed parts. That's why Herbivore is moving to pumps that contain post-consumer recycled materials. Please dispose of them properly.

Leaves my face feeling hydrated, clean, refreshed, and looking happy. I definitely recommend this product, one of my faves from Herbivore, and Sephora in general. <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is fantastic! It does exactly what it promises to do. It removes all makeup, gently, and without any excess oil. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser as a second step in my routine for my dry, often dehydrated skin that periodically gets hormonal acne (no pun intended) and has some patchy redness. First, it's cruelty-free! The packaging has a cute, minimalistic look, and it is recyclable, but I might also reuse it as a dish or hand soap or hand sanitizer dispenser. Ingredients are great, and I'm pretty sure they are safe for sensitive skin (my skin isn't really sensitive, but the ingredients don't look like potential irritants. I would still check INCIdecoder, though). I don't use makeup often, but when I do, I feel like this does help to remove it easily without much left behind unless I'm wearing very stubborn mascara. I also feel like it isn't too stripping - this is my MAIN complaint about most cleansers because my skin is so dry and easily dehydrated. If I were to just use this cleanser with no moisturizer, I would say that my skin does feel a TINY bit tight afterwards, but it's so much less than with any other cleanser, and I never cleanse without moisturizing after, anyway. I'm not really sure why the Sephora page says that this is good for redness because I don't notice an improvement in my redness, but it doesn't irritate my skin and make it worse. I also like the smell of it, but I like rose, and I notice people who DON'T like rose REALLY don't like rose, so if that's a smell you dislike, you might hate this cleanser, haha.  TLDR: Cleanses without stripping, although I'm left with a smidgen of tightness if I wait too long to moisturize. Cruelty-free, recyclable, reuse-able. Likely safe for most sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: Been using this product for well over a year and it is my holy grail item that I canu2019t live without. Will continue to repurchase forever (please donu2019t discontinue!). I have slightly oily acne prone skin and while this doesnu2019t change that, itu2019s gentle on the skin to not exacerbate existing issues.   My favorite part about this cleanser is that it removes my daily makeup and cleanses the skin. I no longer have to rely on a separate makeup remover unless I used a lot of makeup. This greatly helps my nightly routine! I donu2019t generally use a cleanser in the AM but this is gentle enough to do so!   My ONE complaint is that the pump is kinda janky and not smooth and will just shoot the product out if not careful. :( Such a shame for something at this price point.

reviews.review_title: One Year After Using This Cleanser...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my essential daily cleanser because of how gentle it is on my sensitive skin. Like another commenter said, I'm not sure why it has a makeup removing claim when it's a terrible makeup remover on a heavy duty, full glam beat. It does a good job at being a simple cleanser though. Also, another thing to keep in mind is the heavy sweet rose scent. I love rose scents but I know people out there DESPISE the smell of rose. However, the scent doesn't linger for too long, especially once you apply your moisturizer. I've been using this for over a year now and my skin feels plump, tightened, and nearly poreless. Another thing to note is that since this is a (low) foaming cleanser it does leave skin feeling a little tight if you don't follow up with a serum and or moisturizer, like any other forming cleanser. To conclude my review, I think this is a good product to take a risk on buying if you're looking for a foaming cleanser but don't want the harsh tightness that usually comes with it. And not that this matters but if you're like me who likes pretty packaging, this bottle has a beautiful aesthetic to it sitting on your sink. It gives a fancy vibe to your beauty space. Hope this helps. Drink your water too!

But over tile my pores close I got forehead break outs and blackheads all over my face. Itu2019s not non comedogenic, which means it can clog your pores. Sucks I really wanted to love it itu2019s smells good my skin felt nice aside from the breaking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever! Leaves your skin hydrated and doesnu2019t break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser and donu2019t really have anything negative to say about it other than it is missing that je ne sais quoi to make me love it.   I think my issue is that it doesnu2019t leave the skin feeling as soft and supple as other squalane/oil based cleansers, and not as cleansed as foaming/cream cleansers.   It does a fine job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this cleanser, it works great on my oily combo sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for about 4 months and it keeps my skin clear of breakouts and helps to minimize the excess oil my skin produces. my skin never feels stripped after using it. This gel cleanser lathers into a nice foamy consistency. It smells lovely too. I'm not usually a fan of anything rose but this rosewater scent smells fresh and light, and really makes for an overall therapeutic face washing experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! My skin looks so much fresher and dewier after. And I don't know why some people were complaining about the smell... it's a really light rose scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. Itu2019s gentle yet removes all my makeup. I have normally acne prone skin and itu2019s sensitive to new products, this wash has never given me issues, I use it day and night and always feel clean, not stripped of the important stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been searching for a good cleanser that removes my makeup and doesnu2019t make my skin feel tight. I LOVE this stuff! It smells amazing, gets my makeup off (I donu2019t wear heavy makeup most days, so one pump is enough) and my skin feels really clean and fresh with no tightness. Iu2019m going to continue to purchase when I run out. So glad I found this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does the job removing make up. Unfortunately it's a no for me. It was very irritating to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is a pretty great cleanser. It smells kind of weird but I got used to it. I think it mostly removes makeup, but not all the way. I think you are better off going with a cleansing balm for removing makeup but as a cleanser itu2019s great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just bought a second bottle. Great product - very gentle and soothing. It goes feel slimy in a sense but if you can get past that youu2019ll learn to really love the product.   Note: I donu2019t wear heavy makeup so one pump is usually enough but for heavier days I do one pump, rise and pump another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My boss bought me this and i was shocked when i first used it because its like slime. LOL I was like get off me get off me!!! I have to double cleanse with this if I really want to get all my makeup off. But you should always double cleanse if you wear alot of makeup. I would wash with this in the shower because the slime does coat you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this. Itu2019s so light. It left my skin feeling very clean and moisturized. I donu2019t think this is enough for removing makeup, though. I still needed oil to get my mascara off. I usually do that anyway but I wanted to see if this stuff could handle it. I loved it and itu2019s going to be my go to from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like jelly cleansers then you should like this !! It seems to be fragrance free and doesnu2019t leave your face feeling dry. The packing is super pretty and glass. (Since I do not wear makeup I cannot tell you how it works over makeup) :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but I felt like I needed to for this gem. First off, Iu2019ve tried every face wash you can think of & this one right here - let me tell you IS THE ONE. I struggle w dry acne prone skin and anything either breaks me out or makes my skin flake. I have been using this morning and night and itu2019s amazing, I will never use anything less, the texture is so hydrating! My skin has never looked this good.

reviews.review_title: Different formula and doesnu2019t really remove makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A year ago I really liked the formula. It was gentle but left my face decently refreshed. Then this year itu2019s different. It felt less u2018cleansingu2019 and I would use an extra pump to the routine. Still having to use a cotton pad to wipe off residue afterwards. And then I realized the over-doing-it glass bottle it comes in is awfully clunky and wasteful. After 3 bottles and a broken pump, I broke up with this cloud jelly and moved on with a better, lesser cost, plastic squeeze bottle cleanser (also Clean). Best decision ever after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good and leaves my skin so soft, if it was less expensive this would be my go to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell and it works well. The rose smell isnu2019t overpowering, itu2019s nice and light and removes my makeup perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My product did smell off. Iu2019m not sure if all products smell like this or if itu2019s just bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I absolutely love this cleanser, itu2019s great for my combination skin. Itu2019s not stripping and leaves my skin nice and hydrated looking. The only reason Iu2019m rating this 4 stars is because it does smell a little odd, kinda like chemicals, but for the price and amount of product it would be way too hard to pass up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. Its gentle and yet it still cleanses your skin very well. Soft in texture and jelly like. The scent is also minimal so its very universal. My skin is oily and sometimes acne prone. It works great especially after my facials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have never felt a certain way about a cleanser before they were always just okay or not good for my skin. but this... oh my god this cleanser is amazing my skin doesnu2019t feel stripped or dry after using this and i was surprised by how well it removed makeup. works just as well as any cleansing balm iu2019ve used and was so quick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much it is my favorite so hydrating and removes makeup I love the herbivore pink jelly serum too.

reviews.review_title: Not For Sensitive Skin With Rosacea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so disappointed this product did not work out for me. I have dry, sensitive skin with rosacea and since this product was marketed for sensitive skin I decided to give it a go. The first night I used it my skin felt hydrated and dewy, but I woke up to breakouts all over my cheeks. I hoped it was just a random flare up and used this again for another day. It only got worse. The second I stopped using this face wash my skin calmed down again. I loved the product but it just didn't work for my skin type. Those with rosacea should stay away from this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love herbivore! Great gentle cleanser! My face feels so soft and hydrated after using this!

I love this product! I have dry skin and this cleanser really hydrated my skin and also has an amazing smell unlike some other cleaners. One pump is good for one cleanse and seems like it will last a while!!!! Cant wait to buy my second bottle !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soft, gentle and creamy. Lightly fresh Rose scented, a little goes a long way, cleans skin without stripping and leaving any sort of reside. I have sensitive skin, that is prone to break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash so much. I have dry skin and this is gentle enough where I can wash my face in the morning with it, which is very rare for me.   I also use this at night after my cleansing balm and it removes everything but doesnu2019t dry me out. This is my favorite face wash. I find it very affordable too. It lasted me 6+ months and actually cleansed my skin without stripping my face.   My biggest issue is the glass bottle. This product is very pretty but I will not bring a glass bottle into my shower. So I have been struggling to find a good face wash in a plastic bottle for the shower. Wish they had a larger size in a plastic bottle.   But so good. If you have dry skin, I think this is the best face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I soooo love this cleanser!!! It removes all my makeup and doesnu2019t dry my skin. Itu2019s a holy grail for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula, incredible feeling on the skin. I absolutely love the smell which was a surprise because it has a mushroom smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My friend got this for me and I love it itu2019s a very gentle cleanser that never over stripped my skin. Itu2019s a nice gel creamy consistency that turns into this creamy foam when put in water. I have oily skin and sensitive skin and this never irritates my skin or over stripped. It leaves my skin feeling nice and soft and clean without that over stripped feeling

reviews.review_title: A must have to remove eye makeup!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great! It gets all my makeup off and doesnu2019t dry my skin out. It goes on so smoothly so I donu2019t have to rub my eyes too hard, it even removes my waterproof eyeliner! Definitely a face wash staple!

reviews.review_title: One of my new favorite cleansers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is just *chef kiss*. When I first tried it I thought it wasnu2019t going to cleanse my face because of the jelly consistency but when i washed it of my face felt clean. It doesnu2019t give you a squeaky clean feeling so it is friendly to dry skin people. It also last a while because for me you only need two pumps and lather it on a wet face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this cleanser for about 2 months. Before using this, my skin was moisturized and rarely had any breakouts. I didnu2019t know why my skin was so dry and I started to have more frequent breakouts. Now that I think about it, it all started why I started switched cleansers. I didnu2019t think it was because of this cleanser because it has squalane which is supposed to be moisturizing. I have dry skin and this is not really good for dry skin because it strips out moisture. If you also have dry skin, try using a cream base cleanser. It does wonders for dry skin. Also, it does have a weird smell that I canu2019t really describe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this cleanser but ended up returning it. Pros: removed makeup well. Cons: it had a soap sudsy texture that stripped my skin and made it dry, and I didnu2019t like how strongly scented it was (strong rose smell).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to write this review because I wanted to warn people about one thing. I see a lot of reviews talking about receiving product that was discolored and horrible smellingu2026the same thing happened to me when I ordered it. Iu2019ve purchased two bottles in store and theyu2019ve been perfect, but something in transport (maybe heat?) screwed up the product and made it smell and look rotten. If you can, buy in store and I think youu2019ll have better luck! Also possible there was a bad batch, but considering it only happened when I ordered I think it was something in transport.   Otherwise I absolutely love this cleanser and I doubt Iu2019ll ever use a different one. Itu2019s just so good for my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect amount of cleansing and doesnu2019t even strip your skin, Perfect for dry and combination skin !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had so many expectations about this cleanser, following all the stellar recommendations from online influencers. Unfortunately, this is just a meh product and it is quite expensive for a wash-off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To start, I have finished an entire bottle of this cleanser. The best cleanser I have ever used. I have pretty dry skin, and this cleanser leaves my face feeling hydrated and supple while still getting a good cleanse. It also lathers beautifully and has a very subtle rose smell. My first bottle lasted me 5 months, after using 1-2 times a day. Would highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fav cleanser for summer and winter and leaves you skin hydrated plump and so smooth I love pink and doesnu2019t give me breakout great for dry skin love u2764ufe0fu2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it occasionally, both for my morning cleanse and as a second cleanse following an oil-based first cleanse. I love the texture -- it comes out as a gel and then turns into a light foam when you get it wet and lather it around your face. A little goes a long way.  I've tried it on my eyes and I find it stings, though it says you can use it for removing eye-makeup (water-based). Other than that, I haven't seen any signs of irritation after a few weeks of use.  tl;dr: give it a try; great price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had no issues with this product except for the SMELL! Itu2019s gentle and my skin felt very clean after use, but the scent was very hard to get used to. It kind of has a sickly sweet smell? Hard to describe, but pretty unappealing to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good gentle cleanser, I have dry sensitive, eczema prone skin and this has not caused me any problems. I also love that it is in a glass more sustainable packaging. In terms of gentle cleansers I don't think the product is really better than some drugstore options and it doesn't have the best smell. It kind of smells like bubbles you used to blow as a child (which makes sense because that was basically just soap and water)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin feel really textured after continued use. I have dry/combo skin & increased oil. Didnu2019t have any breakouts & did a good job as a second cleanser getting remaining makeup off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this ever since my beloved Ren Clarimatte cleanser stopped being sold at Sephora. It's a really great alternative. I don't notice any fragrance tbh and it cleanses without stripping the skin. I will agree that the pump does dispense a bit too much, usually I like to use half a pump but it's almost impossible to control the amount to dispense. I'm already running out, so unless Sephora decides to bring back the Clarimatte cleanser, this is going to be my new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! By far one of my favorite face washes iu2019ve tried! It takes my makeup off so easily and makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated! 10/10 will purchase again and again, amazing for dry skin with a very light soft scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazingggg face wash for dry dehydrated sensitive skin love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of cleansers and honestly, this one was just average. I don't know why it is so popular. It has a light pleasant smell. It feels nice. But I didn't notice any effects to my skin after using it for three weeks. Will not be re-purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So far I like this cleanser it does have sort of a funny smell but when it comes to skincare itu2019s the ingredients that matter the most to me I bought this as a natural alternative to my ceraVe cleanser which I love but could be drying at times this cleanser makes my skin feel very clean but not dried out itu2019s gentle and effective with a great ingredient list  worth a try

reviews.review_title: Skin is smooth like an ice rink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cannot believe how magical this cleanser is. My skin has never been this smooth and lovely. Clean and bright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really bad like i usually don't mind the smell of roses (i was expecting it because of the rose water) but this products doesn't smell at all like roses, more like musty roses. Overall a good cleanser (hydrating, it does the job) if you can get pass the smell. Im gonna continue using it because im not throwing away 25 bucks but definitely not buying again. Cheaper options that smell better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect balance of cleansing and hydrating during most of the year for me. Strong enough to leave me feeling clean, yet gentle enough to not dry out my skin. If you're looking to address super oily or super dry skin, this might not be for youu2014but if you're looking for something in the middle, it's perfect. The scent is polarizing. I don't personally love it, but it's not a dealbreaker for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great gentle option for those with sensitive skin and it manages to smell really lovely without any essential oils. I also appreciate that it comes in a glass bottle with a well-designed pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down best face wash Iu2019ve ever used, such a nice consistency and smells amazing. Doesnu2019t break me out and doesnu2019t leave my face feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm calling hijinx on Herbivore products. Every time I use one it's just .... meh. This one is no exception. Pump is INTENSE. Comes shooting out with more than I need. Does not remove my nars eyeliner or ysl mascara. Weird goo texture that leaves my face feeling squeaky clean after (not a good thing). It doesn't smell like rosewater or really like anything. It's a substance to wash the face. Ho hum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a rancid product. It looked really pale but I had nothing to compare it to because it was my first time using it. It smelled horrible, like old pickle juice. I thought maybe it was me because I did not read complaints about the scent in reviews. I happened to be passing by a sephora and popped in the see and smell the display. It was more pink and smelled nothing like pickle juice. I did not realize that herbivore products can go bad very quickly. If it smells or looks bad, itu2019s probably bad and you should not continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! Due to having oily sensitive skin its very hard to find product to clean effectively without irritating my skin. This one checks all boxes for me- it leaves my skin crispy clean without drying or inflaming it. Love the gentle scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING FACE WASH! Iu2019ve tried a lot of face washes and this is definitely one of my favourites. Takes off all the makeup and feels very fresh.  Would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome face wash and does exactly what it says: 1-2 pumps removes all traces of makeup. I have tested it with toner on a cotton pad after washing with just this, and the cotton pad comes up clean. I haven't tried using this to remove waterproof mascara, but would imagine you just need slightly more product and to work the eye area a bit more. The bottle is lovely, and the smell is like crushed-up, slightly damp roses. The only downside is the price, but this product looks and feels like a luxury, so I will likely keep buying.

reviews.review_title: Not a cleanser for those sensitive to scent...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had my eye on this cleanser since it released. I decided to buy it on the sale. I loved the texture of it when using it. It was not stripping. It smelled BAD. I could not handle it, I returned the item. Beautiful packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleaner. Smells nice and refreshing. I got a sample first and now have repurchased several times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a nice cleanser! Hydrating, smelled nice, and lathered well! Didnu2019t do anything too special or amazing, but also didnu2019t break me out or mess with my sensitive skin. Also for the price you do get a good amount so itu2019ll last you a decent while! Probably wouldnu2019t repurchase since thereu2019s so many cleansers to try out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t feel like it really cleansed my skin. Didnu2019t see much of a difference so I returned it. Got it because of the good reviews but just wasnu2019t for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My first time using this... itu2019s the best cleanser out there! It feels so hydrating on my skin. I have very sensitive skin and this cleanser did wonders for my skin. My skin felt very refreshed and clean, it did not overly strip my skin which I love. Itu2019s worth it, get this! I will definitely be stocking up on this. If I could give more than 5 starts I would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! My skin is sensitive and Iu2019ve always had difficulty finding a cleanser that didnu2019t make my skin feel like it was burning or tight. This cleanser leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. I love the ingredients and itu2019s also pretty(not that it matters). I like a more gentle cleanser with all the other products I use because I do have hormonal acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite cleanser! I have eczema so itu2019s difficult to find a good thorough cleanser BUT sensitive for my skin. This is it! And no harsh perfumes in it. Bonus points that it looks sooo cute on the counter. Iu2019ll deff repurchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used a cleanser that is this effective and yet feels like a dream. It cleans my oily skin thoroughly and yet the texture is so gentle. Don't be alarmed by the natural rose scent, it's actually doesn't smell like that old lady rose scent, it's fresh and super subtle. The application of this is truly one of the best I've experienced. It also comes in a weighted, gorgeous glass bottle. I found myself always reaching for this in the mornings when I wanted a refreshing, gentle yet effective wash. It took me 6 months to finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and I noticed that I had some breakouts when using this. The fragrance is pretty strong and not my favorite smell (but that is merely just my opinion). Overall is does remove makeup and it's very pretty. I recommend not using too much if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this few months ago but honestly if I could return it right now I would. Iu2019m not enjoying it, maybe because of the consistency. It is a gel (as described), it doesnu2019t feel like it cleanses my face. Maybe I need something that lathers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this for my xxxxtra dry a$& skin! I usually only use very gentle cream, non-foaming cleansers as I use tretinoin regularly. But this one is super gentle and left my skin feeling just as hydrated as when I use my HG Stratia Velvet Cleansing Milk!   The fragrance is very subtle. I wish it was bigger, though. Itu2019s be nice to get at least 5 ounces for 24$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed. I was excited to try it because I heard good things about it, but it did absolutely nothing for my skin. Oh and it smells bad.

this cleanser didn't strip my skin, though it could be a tad bit more hydrating. as some others mentioned, the pump does shoot out a little, so I have to be careful when using it. the scent smells like rose and mushroom, and contrary to some of the other reviewers, I enjoyed it. I would recommend this cleanser to every skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash! I have combination and acne prone skin and this doesnu2019t break me out. After washing with this, my face feels clean but not tight/dried out. Repurchasing for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a sample size and it smelt wonderful. Bought the full size and at first it was fine, and then it started to smell like - ketchup? Very, very strange. Cleanser formula is actually great though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser! Itu2019s not too stripping, but my face always feels clean. My only issue with it is the pump. The cleanser shoots out HARD and I can really be hard to control. Seems crazy, but you kind of have to be careful with pumping it out.

reviews.review_title: Definitely recommend for sensitive, dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser so much! My skintype is usually normal but due to acne medications, my skin is very dry, dehydrated, and sensitive. This cleanser leaves my skin feeling very soft and hydrated! I like that it feels like a luxury experience when using, it's pretty, soft, and i enjoy the smell. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that the pump is a bit annoying and occasionally shoots the product everywhere. I was hesitant about the price but it's lasted me a really long time, using twice a day.

reviews.review_title: All Iu2019ve been using on my dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this face wash for several months now. Itu2019s non-stripping on my dry skin and removes my makeup well. My sensitive skin really likes it. It does have a very faint earthy smell from the ingredients (not pleasant, but not strong). I wish the bottle were bigger u2014 my boyfriend and I go through this wash SO fast. OR if there were ways to get refills, that would be amazing, as I hate to throw away so many of those plastic tops.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this cleanser! but unpopular opinion i hate the smell!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination-oily skin and this was extremely drying and didnu2019t leave my face feeling very different than if i had used just water. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for a month and it cleared my skin but then randomly stopped working. I love this product. So gentle on my sensitive skin and get all the dirt off. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Not the best, but not the worst!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this cleanser! I love the jelly texture, itu2019s super unique. But unfortunately I found this to be a tad bit too stripping for my combo skin. Not overwhelmingly stripping but after I rinsed it off, I needed to follow up with a hydrating toner or serum ASAP or else it wouldu2019ve gotten to an uncomfortably dry point. Hope this makes sense!   Itu2019s not terrible but itu2019s not as amazing as I expected it to be. Iu2019m definitely finishing the bottle but I doubt Iu2019ll repurchase. I can see how this cleanser can be a holy grail for some but it just didnu2019t check all the boxes for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVORITE cleanser ever. I use this as a makeup remover or first cleanse in a double cleanse routine. It is by far the best cleanser I own and definitely worth the $$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really got this when starting retinoids-- something to remove dirt,sunscreen, makeup, without over drying! It Is so lightweight, slippery, and luxurious to use a night! When I have a lot of makeup, I pair it with a balm cleanser, but it works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav cleanser! Very gentle. I'm on accutane and it's perfect for the light mild cleanse I need. Doesn't leave my skin feeling like it's been stripped of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Very gentle on the skin and doesn't dry it out at all (I have combo skin). Only downside for me is the smell, mix of rose and mushroom but it's light enough that it's easy to ignore. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For $24 its a very nice cleanser in a pretty and sturdy bottle thatu2019s surprisingly not bad to travel with as the pump locks. Removes makeup good enough, did not transform my skin by any means though. This is perfect for someone with normal to dry skin that doesnu2019t want a heavy oil based cleanser as this has a jelly/squalane texture thats much lighter than a cream cleanser. I wouldnu2019t recommend this to anyone for an acne clearing or oil cutting cleanser as the actives are more simple and soothing than meant to treat anything in specific. Also the smell was definitely not u201croseu201d at first, but its never stopped me from using it and the scent seemed to get better with time. 4 stars because it performed better than expected but Its on par with a lot of my other favorite gel cleansers like the krave one but its a bit more u201cluxuriousu201d and best as a first cleanse imo.

reviews.review_title: Gentle yet effective with natural rose scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little apprehensive at first, seeing some of the reviews complain about the scent.  Glad I went ahead with the purchase - I very much enjoy the scent!  It's a more earthy rose scent, from the rose flower water they use.  Don't go in expecting anything sweet or perfumey (which I dislike).  Scent aside, it's a wonderful cleanser and exactly what I was looking for.  Leaves me feeling clean without feeling tight of stripped.  The nice rose scent, jelly texture, and awesome glass bottle are side bonuses.  I don't wear much makeup, just eye pencil and mascara, and it removed that just fine.  This cleanser heavily reminds me of the Fresh Soy Face cleanser in terms of consistency and cleaning experience, so if you enjoy that cleanser, I'd say try this one out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser on the market. Gentle, softening, perfect for a double cleanse. Removes all makeup and doesnu2019t hurt your eyes. This is my holy grail. Iu2019ve already purchased this twice and Iu2019ll definitely continue to buy. Herbivore make a jumbo size please!

reviews.review_title: Feels smooth and refreshing on the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift and itu2019s now my new favourite. The texture is so smooth and I find it cooling too. Does not leave a residue or make my face oily, I will be sticking with this cleanser from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: common theme for this brand is the horrible smelling products. This cleanser is prob better for really oily skin, I have kinda oily skin and it still dries it right out and made my skin almost flakey. great glass bottle but thats literally the only good thing about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with combo/oily skin, I never really looked for a hydrating cleanser (my go-to is YTTPu2019s superfood cleanser). But now I absolutely love how smooth, soft, and nourished this cleanser makes my skin feel. Definitely recommend and will likely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great for a double cleanse routine. I use it after an oil-based cleanser, and it doesnu2019t make my skin feel dry at all. The smell is subtle, and it feels nice on my skin. However, nothing about it has really stood out to me - Iu2019ll probably go back to Fresh Soy Cleanser after I get through this bottle because I feel like that one is a bit better at removing any residual makeup my first cleanse missed.  The negative here for me: it might just be the bottle I got, but the pump is AWFUL. It doesnu2019t go down smoothly and if I donu2019t position my hand in a specific way, product will go flying across the bathroom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser Iu2019ve ever used! Makes my skin feel so  clean and moisturized.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan but Iu2019ll finish the bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think aesthetically this is the cutest cleanser Iu2019ve purchased, nothing wrong with the pump (so far), love the heaviness of the glass packaging and the scent itself is quite mild in comparison to some other cleansers. However, I notice that the only difference between this cleanser and the brand Vanicreamu2019s gentle cleanser is the price, packaging and pigment of the cleanser, other than that the formula is exactly the same. Vanicream is $9 I believe at any drug store and is such an effective cleanser with minimal packaging and no fragrance that it has beat out my $30-$100 cleansers over the past few months. I donu2019t mention Vanicream to deter from Herbivore, just noting the formulas are nearly identical, and that I prefer other cleansers to Herbivoreu2019s purely based on cheaper price and effective cleansing abilities. If youu2019re looking to splurge on cleansers, have a pink minimalist aesthetic or try something new this is a great choice - just not one I would repurchase. Best of luck.

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser for normal to dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin, drier in the colder months.  I tend to stay away from creamy cleansers as I feel like they arenu2019t really cleaning my skin, but I really like this one! This is one of the first creamy cleansers Iu2019ve found that really feels like itu2019s cleaning my face. My skin feels soft and fresh after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just purchased this a few weeks ago and it just came in and let me tell you it is AMAZING!!!! So worth makes my skin feel so good!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Consistency: Texture was smooth and wasn't to thick of a product! It lathered up nicely and I feel like just enough product came out with the pump. The component doesn't pump out a stupid amount of product.  What it did: It's a gentle facewash. Does it remove makeup? Kinda(not really though) Does it hydrate? For my dry skin, no it's not hydrating at all. Smell? The smell is...natural.. take that as you will.. It wasn't a smell I liked but it was one I was able to tolerate.   Whose this for?? If you like the brand/want a cute cleanser for your bathroom go for it! Maybe you're young just getting into skincare, then absolutely! For me it just.. wasn't anything special. Would not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a guy using this, I can say it was good.  It was great for me with a beard.  I know some face washes are iffy for us, but this one is very good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great at removing my makeup, Iu2019ve almost finished a whole bottle and my skin has truly never felt so smooth and plump.

reviews.review_title: Gentle, nice cleanser but does NOT remove makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First the PROs: Super gentle, cushiony texture, faint rose scent, very light lather, and feels refreshing on the skin. Good ingredients, great brand. Cleans my very sensitive skin gently without making it feel stripped/dry. HOWEVER...  CONS: it's crazy that this says it's makeup removing. I had a small amount of concealer and eyeshadow on one day (that's it!) and I used this in the shower and afterwards I still had most of my makeup on with bioderma on a cotton pad. This does not remove makeup... AT ALL. don't use this to remove makeup unless you want to break out and clog your pores.  My conclusion: This would be a great morning cleanse or cleanse on a day where you didn't do much but want a nice gentle wash... but it definitely does not remove makeup.

reviews.review_title: overall, love it and the aesthetic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

So if the Drunk Elephant cleanser doesn't burn your eyes and was too drying, maybe try this one?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Buy if you want clean and clear skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for almost a month now in the morning and before bedtime. I absolutely love it! My skin hasnu2019t been this clear in ages. I love the texture of it and how it foams when you massage it on the skin. It has a nice a nice subtle smell. I recommend using a moisturizer after because it can dry the skin a little bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product, and I donu2019t think itu2019s the products fault, but it was too drying for my super dry skin, if you have really dry skin this might be a little too stripping. I also found it was difficult to fully remove, making me have to keep wiping over spots I already wiped leading to further irritation for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in deluxe sample size as part of my purchase and wasnu2019t expecting too much, but it surprised me! Glides on skin like a massaging-gel and creates micro-foam to cleanse skin without leaving it feeling stripped, and has a faint Rose scent that I like. It does also smell a little of chemical/acid underneath the Rose, but since this is a face-wash, it doesnu2019t get to stay on the skin and I donu2019t find it too big of a problem. The cleansing experience feels like that of Tatchau2019s exfoliating face wash minus the scrub part, so that is definitely a good thing as Tatchau2019s wash and gel-cream is one of my favs.  This could be used day and night without worrying too much about over-exfoliating. As for the advertised makeup-removing properties, I donu2019t find it that powerful, especially on water-proof makeup and Mascara, so a double-cleanse is required. Minus one star for the underwhelming but stated makeup-removing effects.  If you wear minimal/no makeup, this cleanser could be a 5-star for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful cleaner! It leaves my skin soft and smooth, removes all traces of make up! It even helps with the redness on my cheeks. At night, I use lapis oil afterwards; it really has cut down on breakouts and redness. During the day I use the orchid oil, it works great even as a primer. I love herbivore products, really are a game changer.  I have used Lapis and orchid  oil for a year, I have been using the pink cloud face wash for only two months. ( Prior face wash used was Fresh Soy face wash. I also use prism mask twice a week and blue tansy mask twice a week. )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent and it feels so silky when you are cleansing your face. It is great for post-workout for oily skin. It isnu2019t super stripping and it still cleans really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels super soft and smooth. A really gentle yet effective cleanser for my morning routine ( I use YTTP cleanser at pm, which is a stronger one in removing SPF and pollution).

reviews.review_title: 100% recommend! Itu2019s totally worth the hype!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was taken by surprise with this cleanser! I wasnu2019t too sure as I have been struggling to find a perfect cleanser for quite some time. I have normal skin with a few blemishes here and there, and some minor redness. This cleansers jelly consistency felt so luxurious on my skin and I didnu2019t have that dry-tight feeling afterwards! Itu2019s definitely my new favourite and I canu2019t wait to see more improvement as I keep using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm just super confused by the rave reviews on this one... and make-up removing? I really don't wear a lot of make-up on a day to day basis, usually brows, mascara and maybe some eyeliner, but this stuff sucked at removing it. Even when using as the first step of my double cleanse it did not remove my make-up well enough to have it be one of the key factors in it's name. Fun consistency, felt nice on the face and the smell wasn't bad in my opinion, but it just, like, didn't do what it's name literally said it would so... it's a no for me, dawg.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is one of the best cleansers I have ever used. I use to use a CeraVe Hydrating cleanser and it was just not working for me and constantly dried out my skin. This cleanser is absolutely amazing, it cleanses my skin so well and doesnu2019t dry it out. Itu2019s also very affordable in my opinion, because you rarely find a great cleanser like this one  under $30. Anytime one of my friends needs a cleanser recommendation this is the one I go too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first purchase from this brand, needing a new more simple cleanser as the 2nd part of my dbl cleansing nighttime routine. It ended up being moved to my more gentle AM cleansing step (I needed something a little u201cmoreu201d for nighttime) but it turned out to be a really solid cleanser overall.  A little goes a long way, a single pump lathers up my entire face. I will admit, the scent was a little off putting at first but it didnu2019t take long to get used to it especially considering itu2019s washed off without a minute or two.   The only true u201cdownsideu201d I had is that the same pump/nozzle is so easily u201ccloggedu201d. I wipe it down after every use yet somehow the next time I use it, the product is squirting everywhere except my hand. Iu2019m not going to give an example, Iu2019m sure some can get the visual.  Overall, I wonu2019t be repurchasing this BUT not bc itu2019s not a worthy cleanser....I just find for my acne-prone, oily skin I need something a little u201cmoreu201d in my cleansing step.

reviews.review_title: Great for eczema, but wish more came in the bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin and eczema on my face and this has helped tremendously with it. My eczema has calmed down a lot to the point where it is almost gone. It also works really well as a makeup remover for the very light makeup I wear (still recommend using a cleansing balm for heavy makeup). The only issue I have is that I wish more came in the bottle for the price at which it is set at.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I have combination skin with a lot of acne, blemishes and hyperpigmentation around my chin area.

reviews.review_title: A nice addition to my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice cleaner that gets the job done! I typically try and steer clear of foaming cleaners because I find that they dry out my skin. I'll be honest, at first I thought this cleaner was just a basic and overhyped product, but after continual use my skin has reacted really nicely. For that reason, I will continue to use it! My skin truly hasn't looked this good in a long time.

reviews.review_title: Gentle but Effective. A Rose Dream !!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so GENTLE and Nourishing ! I love the scent and it effectively cleanses the skin without making it dry. This is by far one of the best cleansers I have used and I am glad I splurged on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

This cleanser is so amazing and has won a full-time spot in my routine. My skin always feel clean and ready to be toned, it never dehydrates or irritates my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Never thought I could love a product more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never had a love affair with a cleanser but this is my everything. So fresh and clean and foamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

It doesnu2019t stick out from most foaming cleansers Iu2019ve tried though, so I think there are definitely get more affordable options out there that people should consider before getting this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I also started using the Prism mask tonight. So we shall see. I'll updated my review in another week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a cleanser to take my makeup off and that was u201ccleanu201d. Iu2019m absolutely obsessed with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it so far !  very gentle and after cleansing my face feel fresh !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: pretty good just not for my skin type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think that this cleanser will work much better if you have more normal to oily skin. It made some blemishes on my cheeks flair up and my cheeks and forehead also became quite dry and tight. I will say though, it is winter so my skin is a lot more dry, so I have switched to a more hydrating cleanser for now. Might re try in the summer time just to see. The pump is also a little funky but not a big issue once you figure it out. Definitely cleans the skin very well and leave you feeling refreshed and squeaky clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite cleanser ever! I love this cleanser, it worked amazing on my skin and reduced my breakouts a lot. Plus itu2019s Hyram approved and it looks so cute :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best consistency. Gel but lathers really well. My favorite cleanser ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT. This gentle wash has become a staple piece for my everyday skincare routine. I received this wash as a promotion sample first, before making the big purchase. The packaging was just super simple & cute to me & I wanted to try new skincare products anyway, so I decided to add it to my shipment order at the time. After trying the sample and using it all up, I decided to purchase the full sized bottle because I am in LOVE. Leaves my skin looking flawless as ever and very soft. I recommended this face wash to my cousin because itu2019s a great buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle on my skin, but does a great job removing dirt, oils and residual makeup.  Feels so smooth and soft after using. Note:  I use in conjunction with a true makeup remover balm, so this is a second cleanse for me and follow up with a toner.  This brand was a little under the radar for me, but I am so glad I found it.  I prefer to mix my products rather than choose from a single line and this is probably one of the best cleansers I've come across for keeping my skin clean, soft and moisturized. Removed one star because I don't think the cleanser would be effective to remove heavy makeup / primer alone without a double-cleanse - which is fine.  You just want to know that going in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoy the smell and feel of this cleanser. I don't love having to double cleanse, so I enjoyed that this cleanser washed away my makeup and left me with clean skin. However, I wear minimal makeup so this product may not give you the same results. The pump is very aggressive and gives you more than needed so I hope Herbivore fixes that soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash works wonders on my sensitive skin. Itu2019s super hydrating and keeps my skin looking fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is SUPER sensitive to fragrance, I was terrified to buy this after reading recent reviews. But - it smells super light and fresh! I use rosewater daily and that's the notes I pick up from this cleanser. It's gentle, leaves my skin feeling fresh and supple. Ingredient list is amazing. I love it!   My ONLY con is that there is a lack of control with how much product comes out of the pump. It's a very specific full amount of cleanser no matter how gentle you push, which is annoying because you lose or overuse product. Otherwise - it's lovely and worth a try for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Not for me, falls short in some areas
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser, because I really appreciate Herbivore and how the brand tries to stick to the natural side.   The cleanser itself isn't that bad. It is gentle. But I prefer a stronger one. It wasn't strong enough to fully remove my makeup or grime. I usually had to use it twice, or with a cleansing balm. The smell is also strange to me. It smells bitter or sour... I can't quite describe it but it doesn't make for the best experience while cleansing  And there seems to be a packaging flaw, unless mine was just a defect. The cleanser dried up and clogged the dispenser every time. Even when I unclogged it, the dispenser used way too much force and ended up shooting the cleanser way too far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Overpriced Cetaphil that smells really good

reviews.review_text: Pros: smells nice, adequate cleanser that doesn't leave your skin tight  Cons: Awful packaging; I get the glass bottle trend, but I just don't prefer glass in the shower. I don't find this cleanser to be superior to Cetaphil which you can get inexpensively at most drug stores.  I don't think this cleanser is worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

However, if this doesn't break you out, I would totally recommend it because it cleaned my face super well & got all of my makeup off. My sensitive skin just didn't like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love love love. my skin after pregnancy totally changed and it has been a struggle. skin is finallllllly clearing up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use CeraVe's foaming and SA face washes, since I have oily skin on the rest of my face and was stuck for a while on what to use on my eyes. The skin around there is super sensitive, and the only makeup I wear is eye makeup. Micellar waters and cotton rounds just weren't gentle enough for me unless the cotton was completely saturated and dripping, and even then it was annoying to have to keep buying micellar water all the time.   This cleanser is perfect as a makeup remover. It doesn't sting whatsoever and is gentle/hydrating enough for where your skin is thinner and more delicate. It's a small bottle, so I don't think the price would be worth it as a main cleanser, but since I'm only using it as an eye makeup remover or to remove a full face once in a while, the price is justified for me. I don't feel guilty about rubbing my eye area with this cleanser, and it feels amazing.

reviews.review_title: The best cleanser for rosacea/sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician with rosacea/sensitive skin that is also acne/texture prone, I loved the ingredients in this cleanser. Very gentle, non-sensitizing ingredients to calm the skin and effectively remove even waterproof mascara. There is rose hydrosol in it but it does not irritate. The smell is a little savory/rose, but it is not strong at all, and there is no added fragrance. This is a low foam cleanser that you apply to wet skin and gently massage to remove makeup, sunscreen, dirt and debris. Most cleansers leave me bright red and stripped but this wonderful cleanser leaves your skin soft and very hydrated. Squalane in the cleanser is responsible for the makeup melting action plus softening/moisturizing. I love this cleanser and I will continue to use it and recommend it to everyone because of how skin-friendly it is, and also eco friendly <3

reviews.review_title: Highly recommended for sensitive, combo skin
