reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t think face wash could make this much of a difference, but my face cleared up right after I started using it. I typically have very sensitive skin, but this didnu2019t irritate it. Doesnu2019t dry out my skin either. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great but the smell of it makes me gag. It smells like rotten milk. But I do love the way my skin feels after I use it but geesh please use a different fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a total Herbivore lover, and I was so SO excited for this cleaner. Everything about the feel of this, from the actual product to the packaging is amazing, it lathers so nicely unlike many non-drying cleansers. I just could not do it with the smell, its bad enough that I returned it. It smells like the weird damp smell that happens when you leave a vase of flowers and the stems start to die, or like weird mushrooms. I love you Herbivore, please go back to the lab and re release this <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest I loved the way this cleanser made my skin feel but I just couldnu2019t get over the smell. I used half gave the rest to my mom. I was hoping the smell would grow on me but it didnu2019t. So I gave it 3 stars for the feel and if you can get over the smell it would be perfect. I just canu2019t. I wish it had more of a smell like the green oil herbivore makes. I like that smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product! Glass bottle which is a bit more eco-friendly than others. The cleanser itself foams up well and leaves my skin feeling nice and clean, but not stripped of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used Philosophy's Purity Made Simple cleanser for years and I've been trying to find a replacement for so long but I have oily/acne prone/super sensitive skin. Every cleanser I've tried has dried out my skin so I was nervous to try this because it does foam a little. I am so glad I tried it! It is seriously a holy grail cleanser. I only use it once a day in the morning and I don't let it get too foamy. I feel like this cleanser took a dead layer off my skin that has been there for years. My face is so much brighter after using this for about a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and finding a cleanser can be a nightmare. I needed something gentle for the winter months as itu2019s already getting colder outside. Most of what I tried left my face feeling stripped but this is luckily doing the opposite. It feels gentle but effective, doesnu2019t leave a film, and doesnu2019t leave the skin feeling dry or stripped. It does have a bit of an odd smell (a mix between the rose and mushroom) but itu2019s not overly strong or unpleasant. I donu2019t use it to remove makeup so I canu2019t speak to its efficacy there, but my face definitely feels clean and hydrated after using this. The packaging is also sustainable (and beautiful).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and returned my other daily cleansing products because I liked this so much. Does it get  off makeup well? I like using two cleansers to take off my makeup especially when I have heavier makeup on but as a daily everyday wash, I like this a lot. It is gentle not overly drying but I do hydrate immediately afterward and my face is clear. The smell is meh but this is a solid product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture and feel of this cleanser is impressive. It is so gentle.

reviews.review_title: The Cleanse with the Velvety Foam!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a lovely cleanser! It starts out as a nice jelly texture, and lathers to a really velvety foam after a few seconds. Feels great on my face, and has a slight smell like most mushroom products do-May take some time to get used to, but itu2019s not terrible. I cannot attest to the makeup removing ability. I usually feel right after using a cleanser, and I didnu2019t not feel that with this cleanser so far. I do double cleanse once a day, and still do not feel that tightness or itchiness after. I have also not had any sensitivities, redness, rash, breakouts etc. with this so far. Iu2019m very satisfied with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST gentle yet effective for sensitive and combo/dry skin! I was on Accutane for a year and ever since my skin has been super dry and sensitive to the point where washing my face would strip my skin even more and make my skin even more irritated. This face wash has been my saving grace! It is gentle so it will not break you out or irritate your skin, but it is so effective in removing ANY makeup and dirt from you face. I have not tried it with waterproof mascara yet, but it has removed any and all makeup other than that. It also has a pump which is amazing because 1 pump is all you need for your entire face. Could not recommend this enough! Will never use another face wash. PS donu2019t be turned off by the face that it has rose water in it... when I read that I was scared that the fragrance would irritate my skin. It is barely noticeable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is really sensitive, and this soap is just perfect. I love the scent, leave my skin soft and not over dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect gentle cleanser! Iu2019ve been using a sample of this product for awhile now and I will definitely purchase the full size product. Cleans face without leaving it feeling like I stripped all of the moisture out of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for my extra dry skin! Lightly scented, moisturizing face wash, removes make up but not overly drying. A must have!

reviews.review_title: Shut up and take my money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. It cleanses enough without stripping my skin. I do not care about the smell because fragrances are not really necessary in a skin care product. I have seen people having bad experiences with this product. However, you need to have a proper skin care routine such as a double cleanser and applying treatments  as well as wearing sunscreen in order to see results. That said, I totally recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect gentle cleanser! This keeps my maskne at bay and doesnu2019t strip my skin. I love the tremella mushroom, squalane and aloe combo it makes my skin feel so hydrated and soothed. I can recognize all the ingredients listed, no weird additives, and I was impressed by the affordable price from Herbivore. The natural rose scent is lovely as well. 10/10 this is a great cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect product. I loved it. Its is gentle. The bottle is so beautiful in pink. It is a good face wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, this is a decent cleanser. It cleanses without being too stripping, and the pump on this product is very nice. It does smell weird though; my husband and I think it smells like boxed hair dye. The smell doesn't linger, but it is odd to rub something with that smell on your face. I do prefer other cleansers over this, but if you need a basic cleanser and/or really like the brand, I don't think you will be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay cleanser but worst pump, it squirts everywhere. 1/3 of the product ends up on my wall, washroom sink and floor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Felt very nice on my skin but didn't cleanse as much as I wanted it to. Even after using micellar water to get off most of my makeup first before I used this there was still quite a bit of makeup on my face. Not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a glossier dupe but this one is a lot more soapier & can burn your eyes a little

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser- especially considering the price point it is SO worth it. I'm not sure what everyone is talking about with a smell, it's nothing thats ever bothered me. Changing to this combined w/ other products helped me breakouts a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face cleanser. I bought the full sized after trying a sample size of it. It is a jelly texture-depending on how you use it it can get decently creamy/sudsy but is not a foaming cleanser by any means. I personally donu2019t mind the scent-i canu2019t put a name to it but it smells natural and not like artificial fragrance or anything. it doesnu2019t linger. it leaves my skin feeling u201csqueaky cleanu201d BUT not in the drying way. it just feels nice, my skin feels plump and firm. i also donu2019t believe it is breaking me out which is a relief as i have oily, acne prone (very) sensitive skin. itu2019s also very pretty to look at. i am excited to wash my face every day lol! I usually remove my makeup before going in with the cleanser-although it does a decent job removing light makeup/sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ignore the scent, it smells like dog shampoo. It cleanses really well and leaves my skin soft. I notice a difference how nice my skin feels in the morning after cleansing at night. I received a sample and will consider purchasing a full size.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU USE FIRST AID BEAUTY...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is better. Lol.   Ok no FAB is great, but their cleanser never worked for my face. I have really sensitive skin and I've been using their cleanser for the past 3 years solely bc it never made me break out and I thought that was all a cleanser could offer me.   This Pink Cloud is amazing though! It's been only 4 uses and my acne is almost 100% cleared up. I never knew a cleanser could do that for me. I still have some dark marks that are slowly fading and two pimples that are almost gone, but this stuff is a lifesaver, go buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So.... it cleanses the skin nicely but the scent is just too much. Itu2019s so heavily fragranced and reminds me of something you might have gotten in middle school thinking that you smell sophisticated. Luckily I just got a sample size and didnu2019t waste money on it. I had to hand it off to my husband who can handle the strong scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this cleaners except the smell. Itu2019s absolutely awful. I canu2019t tell what ingredient is causing it, but it smells like bad fish. Unfortunately will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this cleanser. It was gentle yet effective. The best part is that it didnu2019t leave my face tight or dry! 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_title: not worth the hype or coin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal, dehydrated acne prone skin. I was so excited to try this cleanser based on the reviews, but was really disappointed. I hate the scent, it smells like old lady soap! The texture is true to the description,  a moisturizing jelly. However like others, I find it hard to wash off, like I need to use a warm wash cloth to insure my skin is not left with any cleanser.  Not what I am looking for in a cleanser!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely not for my skin type. I have dry skin and used this just once .My skin dried out and skin peeled off leaving my face with red spots .I received this as sample so threw it away.  I would not recommend buying it if you have dry and sensitive skin .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Larger than expected and the bottle is beautiful. It does need water in your face to actually work like a cleanser tho. It is ok I guess just did not help or hurt my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't understand all of the hype on this. It's just an overpriced cleanser in a fancy glass bottle. I'll admit that the bottle looks nice on my counter, but the cleanser itself isn't special. It smells kind of musty and the texture of hard to rinse off entirely. I also got a couple bad breakouts while I was using this, and I have a feeling it's because it wasn't cleansing my face very well. Disappointed and will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful texture! No scent! Foams up very lightly after massaging it in for a few seconds. Washes off super easy and doesnu2019t smell like anything. And the bottle is goooorgeous! All around great product I definitely recommend this if youu2019re looking into buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser! The texture is fantastic, as it does not disappear into your skin right away, so you can tell which parts of your face you are actually cleaning. I also enjoy how soft it leaves my skin, and it's very effective at makeup removal, even mascara. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful foamy cleanser. Light and non drying. Lovely scent. Not a deep cleaners or exfoliating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t sure how I would like this, since I already have a heavy artillery of cleansers Iu2019m pretty attached to (tacha- the rice polish, farmacy- green clean, drunk elephant- beste no9 jelly cleanser) but i really loved the one. it goes on so smooth and lathers ever so gently, and it manages to clean off all my makeup without stripping my skin- it stays fresh and hydrated and bouncy, even after i rinse it off. (that was the one draw back actually- it seemed to take a while to rinse off? it was almost like it hydrated my skin so well that when rinsing it off it was almost hard to tell where the cleanser ended and my skin began. briefly.) but really i was very pleasantly surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so unpleasantly surprised by this product! With such good reviews, and the clean seal, I thought Iu2019d love it. But it made my forehead breakout like crazy within one use. I tried it for a week to give it a real shot, and it just got much worse. I boxed it up and went back to my old Aveeno cleanser. And after just two days, my skinu2019s already clearing up. The smell was also a bit strange - perhaps the mushroom? Was really hoping to love this like the other reviewers, but sadly I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE the texture of this. super lightweight and goes nicely on the skin. once i washed it off it i felt clean but definitely not over stripped. this is a super gentle cleanser and is exactly what i need since i use it on the days i donu2019t use my strong salicylic acid cleanser. i love the smell of this too! not overwhelming at all.

reviews.review_title: good cleanser, not a lot of product for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser, but such a small bottle for what you pay. I would compare it to Philosophy cleanser, it's gentle, not heavily scented, and takes all makeup including eye makeup well. I just don't think I can justify the price for the amount you get. I have had this for about a month using it twice a day and I'm halfway done. My other cleansers last at least a few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. I have oily skin thatu2019s normally not very sensitive at all but this stripped my skin and left my skin burning afterwards. Luckily I got it as a sample so no loss on my part but canu2019t say I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really enjoy this cleanser. Itu2019s gentle, my skin likes it. Plus itu2019s vegan and the packaging is so nice. No complaints except to avoid the eyes when cleansing but then again thatu2019s every cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first... Iu2019m like that with cute packaging. LOL. Like, itu2019s cute, but will it work?! IT DOES FOR ME! Iu2019ve noticed my skin brighter and no breakouts whatsoever. Iu2019m in love. Iu2019ve found my staple cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this product is just awful. I was expecting a light rose scent but it smells like a rose someone let rot in mud and chemicals. Herbivore products always seem rotten/spoiled! Results from the wash were nothing impressive either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I initially really loved this product! It smells great, I loved that it was a clean cleanser. I wasnu2019t sure how great it was working, but I was consistent using it every night! But Iu2019ve had it for a month and I leave it in my bathroom. I found it started to mold! I was so grossed out I threw the bottle away. What a waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have not noticed that this cleanser leaves my skin feeling amazingly soft or anything, really. It just cleans my skin without drying it out or leaving my skin feeling weird. It's no miracle worker but what cleanser is? They're usually not on your face long enough to make a difference. Will I keep buying it? Yes, because it removes my SPF and cleans my face without having to use a second oil based cleanser to remove the SPF. It also smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complete obsessed, love the way it makes my skin feel and look!!

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend this deliciously light cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sensitive skin in need of non drying, non oily, and non fragrant face wash for clear skin.  Look no further!  PINK CLOUD was everything I need and more.  Not only does it leave my skin feeling great, it's actually correcting what some previous washes did to my face.  Plus it's so joyous to use each day with it's color and packaging.  Highly reccomended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great smell (rose but not too strong) and pretty package. Love the pump dispenser (but watch out because it can shoot across the room if your hand is in the wrong place... oops!). Nice jelly consistency that goes on and washes off very well. My only complaint is that it is a bit too drying for my skin (combination). Overall itu2019s great!

reviews.review_title: I didnu2019t know the perfect cleanser existed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I technically bought this unused off of someone that purchased it through sephora, but definitely going to buy this again whenever I run out. I have never used a cleanser that left my skin both so clean and still so soft and not striped at the same time. I have very sensitive skin that easily breaks out/reacts to most products and donu2019t venture away from my routine often but this has become a permanent staple for me. I love that this has plant derived squalene and I swear my pores have shrunk, but maybe thatu2019s a coincidence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using cleanser for a month and I feel like itu2019s definitely helped in clearing up my acne! I havenu2019t had any major breakouts or purging since Iu2019ve started using this so  itu2019ll be a keeper in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful but this burns/stings my eyes. I'm not sensitive at all and my skin pretty much never has adverse reactions to skincare but after several attempts just to make sure it was the cleanser and not something else irritating my eyes, its definitely this face wash. Am using as a hand wash to not be wasteful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved my experience with this product, packaging was luxurious! I love the way it feels in my hands, and the creaminess of the lather...The smell is light and clean. I love how its grabs your skin and removes the impurities...reminds me of the feeling of washing gel out our my hair. Doesn't leave my skin dry or stripped..I followed up with amethyst scrub and it was a great duo! This cleanser just make me feel pretty and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gentle and light on the skin. a great price for all the product that you get. follow with Orchid facial oil.... its transports you away

reviews.review_title: Where have you been my whole life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical because the price is so reasonable.  Best face wash I have used in a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful to look at and smells great, but this didn't work for me at all. I used it once a day for 2 weeks straight. I know it's a jelly cleanser, but the texture is oddly slippery, almost slimy. Hard to describe; kind of felt like it was sitting on top of my skin and sliding around. Sort of difficult to rinse off too. I noticed a slight skin tightness/dried out feeling after rinsing and drying my skin which tells me it stripped away too much of my natural oils. I would describe my skin type as dehydrated but oily on the surface, so non-lathering, creamy cleansers are usually best for me, but this was so pretty I had to try it! Sad I am going to return it or give it away to a friend. The quest for my holy grail face cleanser continues...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s ok. Not the best cleanser not the worst. Just wouldnu2019t repurchase it. Itu2019s very concentrated I will say that. Smells a lot like rose water so thatu2019s good. Just ok not memorable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am VERY picky about cleansers. I used the same for cleanser for maybe 5 years or more, but decided to try this one out on a whim and OMG it's the best. Doesn't leave you stripped, yet it cleans EVERYTHING. It's gentle and effective. New holy grail without a doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture of this cleanser. Wanted to try something new..still love my current cleanser but decided to try this one out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product. My skin used to be so dry and dull, this product has helped to hydrate my skin and makes it so smooth after every wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because my usual favourite cleanser was out of stock (Youth To The People), and Iu2019ve enjoyed other Herbivore products so gave it a try. Super gentle, a little goes a long way and my skin isnu2019t dry or tight after using! I use as second cleanse in my double cleanse routine after oil cleansing. Love the glass packaging, lockable pump and Herbivoreu2019s usual commitment to clean, quality ingredients. Price is excellent especially since you need so little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Takes off all my makeup but is super gentle, my skin doesn't feel stripped at all. Very fair price, cruelty-free and vegan, and glass packaging. I finally found my holy grail cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, this is why this brand is one of my favorite brand . They doing great . It cleanses everything, it is nice and smooth after I wash my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really surprised! I needed a new cleanser but have been trying a new cleanser every time mine runs out so I decided to grab this as it was at a nicer price point. I have bumps on my face (karatosis) and it really calmed it down. It removed makeup even my makeup wipe didnu2019t get off. I have combo-oily skin and itu2019s not over hydrating. Itu2019s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonu2019t be buying another cleanser ever again. This one never leaves my face feeling dry or flakey, but it gets every morsel of makeup off my face- every time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just your friendly Biochemist here. Despite being awarded the clean at Sephora mark, of the 23 ingredients listed, 18 of them were significantly unsafe: mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, talc, toluene, coal tar (not as unsafe, but I wouldn't put it on my skin), hydroquinone (whitener, avoid if skin dark/melanistic), triclosan, triclocarban, ethyl methacyrlate, methyl methacrylate, hydroxypropyl methacrylate, trimethylolpropane trimethacrylate, butoxyethanol, carbon black, lead acetate, resorcinol, butylated hydroxyanisole, butylated hydroxytoluene, and styrene among others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE worst smelling face wash I have ever used. The packaging is gorgeous, the actual face wash itself is fine.... just the smell is so awful I will never repurchase this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser! It is a great cleanser that does not strip your skin dry. The texture is wonderful and the scent delightful. This is for sure a staple in my routine and should be everybodyu2019s staple as well! Love this! I appreciate that it comes in a glass bottle as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I needed a new cleanser because it appears that my skin got use to the ones that I was using and it just stopped working. my skin started to break out like CRAZY. Never had to deal with this before so I bought this and my skin is finally getting back to normal. I love that I only need one pump and how soft my skin feels. Doesn't feel dried out and I can use it with my Tatch rice cleanser for double cleansing. I feel like this weather and having to wear mask really made my skin freak out and like I said before I think my skin got use to the cleansers I have been using which I do still love. The packing is really cute and I keep it in the box because I loved it too much to throw away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so nice. One small pump is all you need. my face felt moisturized and fantastic. I wasn't a huge fan of the smell but it is very light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin, especially in the Wintertime and this cleanser is so nice and soft, very moisturizing.  You only need to use one little pea-sized amount, so this lasts a long time.  I have bought this again.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the way this makes my face feel and the smell. Packaging is also great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh. My. God. This cleanser is my holy grail. It leaves my face feeling so smooth and not stripped like every other that Iu2019ve tried. BUY THIS! Itu2019s so good for all skin types!
