reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser! Leaves my skin feelings so soft and clean. Will definitely buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice face wash. It makes my face soft and smooth with no breakouts. will be replacing my belif cleanser with this from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In love!!!  okay first one pump is too much for me.  a half a pump is enough.  my face feels super clean and soft.  i have normal to dry skin and it doesn't dry me out like other cleansers.  love the Smell, the packaging, just everything about this.  never tried anything from this brand before either and im glad i did. will buy again.  get it sis!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the first cleanser that foams that doesnu2019t irritate the skin around my nose. I was waiting for my skin to get right and irritated and it never happened. it really might be the best cleanser iu2019ve ever used. the scent also isnu2019t strong enough to be annoying, itu2019s just a mild rose-y soap smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Left my skin clean and shiny but not too stripped! Liked the texture and smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skin type: very dry, redness prone, sensitive. I've been using this for about a week. My initial thoughts were: I was expecting it to be more creamy than jelly but it's a standard jelly cleanser similar to Drunk Elephant's as fas as consistency and texture. The smell is ultra-clean and fragrance-free of which I like (less irritating to sensitive skin types like mine). With that being said, it didn't strip my skin (like most jellies do), but it didn't hydrate it either. The bonus is that I thought it removed all of my sunscreen and tinted moisturizer and my face felt clean without being stripped. Also, it DID NOT irritate my skin at all, which is a big A+ from me. Also, an A+ for the beautiful packaging. Knocking off one-star because it does not hydrate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser but it made my skin burn when i used it. The smell is a bit strong but not overwhelming. I have pretty dry skin and it didn't dry me out. My skin just didn't like it. I liked the ingredients but i guess my skin didn't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels nice, is gentle on the face, and the packaging is pretty, but it smells so weird--like a cheap bathroom soap. It was a no go for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way, lathers up really nicely and smells divine! Face feels super soft after using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product. I have to say that I love that cleanser. My skin is beautiful since I started it (I didn't have any skin problems, just a bit of acne but it is less apparent since I started using it). Easy too use, packaging in glass so its environmental friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes me smile when I wake up to wash my face in the morning. The scent is light and the texture is not foamy but not slimy, just spreads nicely. The cleanser adds a hint to luxury into morning skin routine.  I love that the glass is recyclable.

reviews.review_title: One more for the favourites list
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this cleanser as my regular cleanser was out of stock again with no idea when it will be back. It came highly recommended so thought I would give it a try. It is really nice and not stripping at all and my skin feels very clean and soft after. I love the lather as well. I only use 1 pump which is enough. I only gave four stars because I am not too keen on the rose smell but I am getting used to it. It is definitely also on my favourites list now

reviews.review_title: Literally BEST cleanser Iu2019ve ever used. GOAT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used a bunch of the u201cbestu201d cleansers for a few years now, including Drunk Elephant, Youth To The People, etc... And this is the BEST. As someone with combination skin (a few dry patches and an oily t-zone), this cleanser does wonders. I was a little deterred considering the price per oz compared to the others, but I use waaaay less of this bc it lathers up to like 1000% its size. I use two pumps (literally a pea size) and itu2019s plenty after lather. The product has a pleasant jelly feel on the face, unlike the Drunk Elephant, which feels like a dry jelly and you use way more. Pleasant, natural smells and it leaves my face feeling like itu2019s already moisturized before I even continue my routine. Def recommend, already got another friend hooked. Now, I look at the price as a steal bc the formula is amazing and the packaging is always perfect with Herbivore. Bless yu2019all <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Itu2019s super gentle, non stripping, and has a really nice consistency. It does have an odd scent, but it doesnu2019t bother me too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the best I have ever tried it is sooo good!! it would get a 5 star from me or even 6 if there was the option however, that 1 star loss is due to how quickly this bottle finishes. I only used it for 2 weeks, 1-2 pumps a morning and 1-2 pumps at night and I am already more than halfway done with it..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product and I love it! The name doesnu2019t lie it feels like jelly. Itu2019s so gentle it doesnu2019t even feel like itu2019s cleaning your face, but when you rinse it off your skin feels more moisturized which is hard for a cleanser to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite cleanser. It makes my skin feel smooth and clean. It takes off EVERYTHING but does not strip or dry out my skin on even the slightest bit. Ahhhhmmmmaaaazzziiinnngh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this cleaner for about a week but I really love everything about it. The look, the smell, the feel. Overall I have no complaints! It feels like my skin is feeling cleansed and nourished evenly. I use microceller water before washing my face and finish with Herbivoreu2019s u201cPrismu201d serum every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the creamiest , softest , luxurious cleanser Iu2019ve ever owned .  My face feels clean but not stripped .  I look forward to using it at the end of a long day .  The only negative I would say is the bottle , for an on the go person I would love to use in the shower but too scared i would drop it and it breaks .  But I would definitely recommend and buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: creamy, gentle lather, doesnu2019t leave your skin feeling stripped. the price is unbeatable and the packaging is also beautiful; i love the glass bottle. very comparable to soy face cleanser from fresh but leaves the skin feeling a little more nourished. will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The jelly cleanser is easy, gentle on the skin and An effective Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to find a product that used sustainable packing and didn't include palm oil products. I purchased from sephora and immediately went home to use it because I was so excited. Unfortunately, this cleanser completely stripped my skin and left it almost painfully dry. Then came the awful after effects including surge of oil and resulting breakouts! I have combination skin but its honestly not too oily or too dry. I have never had a reaction to a skincare product like this before. No clue why this happened because this product clearly seems to work for other people, but be aware this could possible happen to you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so bad and irritates face. Makes my face super red and breakout. Sad because I loved the moisturizing cream version of this ):

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Compared to all of these other reviews, I don't know if I got a bad batch or they just paid a bunch of people for reviews, but my experience with this product was less than optimal.  Left my skin feeling stripped and dry (would not recommend for dry/combination/normal skintypes) despite using moisturizer after.  Also smells like hospital handsoap. Worst-smelling facewash I have ever smelt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is so soothing!It feels nice, rinses clean, takes away waterproof eye makeup, and smells awesome without having an aggressive fragrance. It knocks Glossier out of the water, and I prefer it to Bliss as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does not smell good to me...it smells like musty soap?  I have sensitive skin and it left a tingling, almost burning sensation.  I had to cool it down with my toner and face oil.  Will be giving this to someone who can tolerate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Usually donu2019t give products a review but I had to because of how much I love this!! this cleanser is so so great it has such a light tint of rose but it also has no fragrance which I love! Totally recommend if your looking for A good cleanser. This cleanser doesnu2019t leave my skin stripped or dry at all it actually feels very hydrated and soft. LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasant texture and scent, gentle enough for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So i have had a hard time find the 2nd cleanse of my double cleanse. They either dont clean well enough or clean too much and leave my skin feeling super dry and cracky.  I was hesitant at first but i received a sample of this when i ordered the blue tansy mask. Tried it and liked it so bought the full size.  It leaves my skin soft. The fragrance of rose is so light that its gone almost as soon as you smell it. Lathers well and removed wvwry trace of my oil cleanse if amy is left over.  I am in my forties and my skin is oily combo with dry patches and slightly dehydrated depending on the day. My skin is sensitive and reactive and this cleanser has not bothered me in the weeks i have been using it.  Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser really did well for my skin. I have adult combination skin with some hormonal acne. I purchased a different cleanser that dried my skin instantly and replaced it with Pink Cloud and I noticed a significant difference after one use. My skin actually felt hydrated. I am on day 3, I use it twice per day and my skin feels firmer and more hydrated. This is a big deal for me to actually have this type of affect from a cleanser alone. I like the smell because it's light. The packaging is so gorgeous and I only need half to one pump and it produces enough cleanser for my entire face, neck, and chest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is like cotton candy. You enjoy it while using it, smells sweet and looks tempting but just like excess calories, waa it really worth it? We all know it never is. Love the glass bottle though :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I cannot believe what I have witnessed. to try this product out to its limits, I used it to clean my full face glam look with full coverage foundation and everything on (except for falsies). I washed my entire face using this cleanser, and the toughest makeup, benefit theyu2019re real mascara, that does not just come off easily came off sooooo easily. Damn iu2019m still shook! Iu2019m so shook that iu2019m going to do it all the time from now on.  The only draw back is the smell, it has this old stale smell :/ Itu2019s hard to describe but it doesnu2019t not smell nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I buy a new cleanser, I always think there must be a better one. This one was not like that. I love everything about it!  It smells really fresh but isn't overwhelming. It is SO smooth and glides over your skin like a cloud. You can tell the second it hits your skin how moisture retaining it is. I have combo skin, it cleanses without stripping too much. Both my oily and dry areas feel really balanced.  It also emulsifies with water really well. It only takes a small amount to cover the whole face so I know it is going to last a while.  I bought it because of the ingredients and description and will continue to buy it because of the experience and results. And I love that it comes in a glass bottle. Thank you for another stellar product Herbivore!! <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this has a lot of hype and everyone loves this cleanser, but unfortunately it made me break out like I was 16 again. The first time I used it it was amazing, but then it made my skin super super dry and then the major breakouts started (whiteheads all over my cheeks in patches right after washing). Too bad :(( 3 stars because I want to like it but can't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with my last purchase and it is so good! I love how well it removes makeup and makes my skin feel so clean. Iu2019ve been using it in conjunction with my pink clay bar and my skin looks and feels great. The only con for me is that the pump on the mini bottle doesnu2019t work. My sisters birthday is coming up and Iu2019m going to send it as a gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try an Herbivore product.  This face wash is the best.  It leaves your skin silky clean and smells great. Checks all the boxes of a great Face wash. Iu2019ll be buying more of their items soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For context I have sensitive skin & eczema and I do not react well to products that have chemicals. I have been using Herbivore products for years now and Iu2019ve never used a product from them that has irritated my skin. So I was excited to try this Pink Cloud Cleanser and it did not disappoint! It lathers just enough so my pores feel throughly cleaned but it also doesnu2019t strip my natural oils away. And you only need to use a tiny amount. For its price point I think it will last a long time. I think the key to the success of this product is the use of the mushroom ingredient. It hydrates and leaves my skin feeling bouncy, not dry and tight. If you have tried and loved Herbivore products, you will love this cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I received it as a free sample from Herbivore, and I have been impressed enough that I will be purchasing in a full size. I have pretty sensitive skin and this has done nothing to irritate it (probably thanks to the ingredients). Instead, it has helped with the pesky dry spots I have been struggling with for months. Even after adding in serums and additional moisture, this cleanser has been the most effective product in combatting those spots. It's very moisturizing for a cleanser, plus it feels silky and smells lovely. I do a full minute cleanse with it and still--no dry spots! I switched from the Glossier Milky Jelly, and while this is slightly less product for a slightly higher price, the results (and the switch to cleaner ingredients) is enough to justify the (still reasonable) price point!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great!!! Itu2019s very gentle and doesnu2019t overly lather. It removes residual makeup well (Iu2019ve only used it after using my makeup eraser cloth) and leaves my skin feeling soft, moisturized and smooth. Its also does not break out my skin (a plus)!! The scent is more like an u201cessenceu201d of rose with something underlying that I canu2019t quite figure out. The scent is subtle though and I definitely prefer itu2019s scent to a u201cstrongly perfumedu201c one. I started out with a free sample and then purchased the full size. Itu2019s becoming one of my favs and Iu2019m happy I added it to my growing Herbivore collection!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample with a recent Herbivore purchase and I really liked the product but the pump was too small and I felt like I had to press so many times to get a decent amount.  I bought the full size and it's fantastic.  I have fairly oily skin so I tried using the Farmacy cleansing balm, or the Caudelie Micellar Water first, and then the Pink Cloud for a sort of double cleanse, and it was AMAZING.  Great for dry skin and also a wonderful double cleanse accompaniment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite!! Iu2019m a sucker for beautiful packaging so this reeled me in, but I love the formula just as much honestly. Super creamy, has a really nice lather, and leaves my skin feeling super clean and smooth. A lot of cleansers are really stripping for my acne prone skin but this was lovely, and tbh the price is actually really decent for Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this consistently every morning after using my Purito From Green Cleansing Oil. I personally love the smell which is what some people have been complaining about. It smells clean and fresh, itu2019s especially relaxing in the mornings when I just woke up and am barely moving. So far I really like it. I would probably buy again, but I currently have other cleansers lined up to test out, but definitely in the running for repurchase. It is very gentle and does not leave me feeling dry and tight. My skin feels very clean and soft after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this face wash! I love how it's not heavily scented and it's really big! I add a bit to the palm of my hand (a little goes a long way), then I add a tiny bit of water, rub it well to create a lather and massage it all over my face. I like to leave it on for a few minutes to get the most of it. When I rinse my face, it leaves it feeling soft and looking beautifully dewy and glowy! I'm definitely purchasing this again. Well done, Herbivore. <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Does not smell good itu2019s almost musty. Itu2019s a good cleanser and I love the glass packaging very pretty but the pump on mine (at least) is very easy to shoot everywhere itu2019s almost spring loaded too much. I only need one pump of the cleanser. My favorite cleaner is still H2O+ beautyu2019s Keep it Fresh face cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is gorgeous and luxurious.    It cleanses without drying.     It smells like carrots, which is odd but not bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just the perfect cleanser for my acne prone skin. Leaves me soft but clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a great gentle cleanser, but it does not smell good at all. I was hoping it would smell like the pink cloud moisturizer, but it doesn't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is the cleanser you need! gentle, effective, PERFECT. reminds me of glossier milky jelly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've quite happy Herbivore released a pump style cleanser which I've been hoping for, for a while. The packaging is a nice glass bottle to which I prefer over a plastic bottle.  It lathers up really nicely, the smell is a little off-putting (can't quite put my finger on it... it has a faint rose smell but mixed with another scent.) The texture is light, creamy and feels nice massing it into the skin.  I have noticed it helps with redness, but not dryness  I don't wear heavy make-up; just a light/medium coverage foundation, concealer, and some mascara.. it did a good job of removing my makeup, but personally I would use this product in a double-cleansing method.  I like this product, but unfortunately it's not something I would repurchase again.

Iu2019ve been an Herbivore customer for some time now and I love this product. Itu2019s so gentle, I let my 11yr old daughter use it as part of her facial care regime. You know, those puberty years. The texture is like a mix between a gel and a liquid. Itu2019s amazingly soft! The best part is that it doesnu2019t u201c over-foamu201d, for lack of a better word. I absolutely hate when it takes too long to rinse off the lather. Also, Herbivore products are notorious for being a bit pricey. At this price, I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: NOT MY FAVORITE SMELL, BUT AMAZING RESULTS!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received this product, the one thing that put it off was the smell. Lots of people claim it smells like the fresh rose toner, and having both products, I beg to differ. The smell is almost like coconut water with floral, and I did not like the smell at all. To me it was almost like the smell of a hotel soap. However the smell isnu2019t strong, and after using it for the past few weeks, I have kind of gotten used to it. This cleanser is truly amazing; it definitely cleans deeper than the soy fresh cleanser, but does not leave the skin feeling stripped. My skin feels amazing and soft afterwards. Love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! A very different consistency compared to anything Iu2019ve used. Takes off all of my makeup. Gentle yet effective!

reviews.review_title: relieving for dry, sensitive, eczema-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is the first cleanser iu2019ve used in a while where i really felt a difference in my skin not feeling so dry and stripped after washing, and i have used it only a few times so far. iu2019ve always had dry, sensitive, eczema-prone skin (in dry climate) and for almost a whole year iu2019ve been suffering from an allergic skin reaction all over my face due to propylene glycol (which is in so many makeup/skincare products) u2014 this cleanser has provided me some relief so far in making sure iu2019m not further irritating/drying what iu2019ve been struggling to fix!  trying this out is one of my first steps in revamping my skincare routine and i have no complaints so far. (iu2019ll certainly change this review if anything worsens, but hopefully not lol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the last few months Iu2019ve been using the Youth To The People Kale, spinachu2019s and green tea cleanser and I would put them on a similar spectrum. Not overly drying, but I definitely feel cleansed and refreshed afterwords. I find this one to give less of a stripped/dry feeling than the youth to the people one if accidentally left on longer than normal.  Iu2019m enjoying the consistency of this one more as instead of all foaming up right away or getting eaten up by my Clarisonic, this one just sits on the brush beautifully until I can reach all the sections of my face without having to pile the product on my brush or go back for more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I was struggling to find a cleanser gentle, but effective enough to take off ALL of my mascara at the end of a work day (without irritating my eyes) & this does the trick. Love how it makes my skin feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin that reacts to many skincare products with breakouts! I started using Herbivore bar cleansers about a year ago with the rest of my routine and my skin has stayed clear ever since. I loved the way those worked for my skin and the price point is awesome too however Iu2019m just a sucker for a beautiful glass pump cleanser to keep in my shower. I was ecstatic to see this new product in Sephora in my most recent trip. I am in LOVE with this cleanser and this it is perfect for those who have combination/oily and sensitive skin. The packaging on this product is perfection, the price point for the ingredients and packaging components are impressive, and the formula itself is unique in consistency, lather, and results! I already ordered 3 more because I know this is my new holy grail cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and will absolutely be purchasing this in the future. I have combination skin, and this cleanser does a great job of tackling oil and residual makeup, while leaving my skin feeling clean but not completely stripped and dry. The great light rose scent is a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this beautiful looking cleanser but sadly Iu2019m returning it. After 1 wash my skin was left very dry and uncomfortable. Even after I moisturized my skin still felt dry. Very strange because Iu2019ve never had that happen before. Iu2019m 37, female, combo skin leaning to more oily skin. I use only clean skincare. I really love the Biossance antioxidants cleansing oil and the Drunk Elephant Pekee cleansing bar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and boy was I in love. Made my face feel very clean but not dry in the least. I was not the biggest fan of the rose notes but its very subtle! I will definitely purchase and add to my skin care routine!

reviews.review_title: A good cleanser for my sensitive face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not too overdrying and left my face feeling soft and clean. A little goes a long way. Enjoyed the light rose scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this the second I saw it on the Sephora site because I knew that herbivore was going to have a great cleanser. The texture reminds me a lot of the old Clinique cream cleanser I used to use back in the day. This one doesnu2019t strip my skin however and I have pretty dry skin so I look for this. It does remove make up although it will sting your eye a little bit if it gets in there. If Iu2019m wearing a lot of makeup Iu2019ll go in with an oil cleanser first but in these quarantine days I barely wear any so Iu2019ll just use this at night and Iu2019m good. Also UPS accidentally sent mine to the wrong house and Sephora send me another one! Great customer service on their part and a new favorite cleanser woop

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a dreamy cleanser. I have sensitive, oily skin and this cleanser is gentle and moisturizing. Subtle rose scent that makes it feel even more luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad Herbivore is making such an amazing cleanser! It feels so luxurious on my skin and even though it does remove makeup well, it never feels like it strips my face of not only my makeup but of any moisture I may have. My skin feels so nice and supple after using it. I follow it with my Herbivore oils and they just slide right on and sink into my skin. I used the entire sample bottle before reviewing to make sure I didn't have any kind of negative reaction. My skin loves this cleanser! Absolutely buying the full size. So excited I get to use Herbivore products for my entire skin routine now, my skin looks so healthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so amazing!  So super easy to use and really does an excellent job of cleaning the day off of your face!  Love it so much I got one for my daughter and we are both in LOVE with all Herbivore Products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy herbivore created a creamy cleanser! I was struggling with u201cmask-neu201d as the weather got hotter and this helped clear it all up. I love how hydrating it is. My skin feels so soft and smooth after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle cleanser without any chemical scents, love it! I might actually upgrade from the herbivore bar soap to this cleanser permanently! I do need to use several pumps to clean my skin thoroughly but not a huge deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gentle cleanser. It removes dirt and oil yet doesn't strip skin of all moisture. I love how my skin feels after using- smooth, clean and still bouncy. It may not be best for removing extended wear foundation or eye makeup but not often wearing that type of makeup these days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this cleanser. It cleanses completely without destroying my skin barrier. The texture is so unique. Bouncy and creamy at the same time. I have combination skin, but recently it has been dry and very sensitive. I didnu2019t feel any stinging or have any redness after using this cleanser. Just soft, clean skin. Also, the colour is so dreamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely like this cleanser. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry or tight. It is rose scented, which I don't really like but now that I've been using it for a month or so, I have gotten used to it. My skin is combination with dryer areas, and it hasn't been exacerbated by this cleanser at all. I really like that it comes in a glass bottle. It makes the product feel nicer in the way that plastic doesn't. It's also easier to recycle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a pleasant scent and doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin or leaves it feeling tight after. Foams up nicely and removes all my make up and sunscreen. The packaging is also beautiful which is a nice bonus. If youu2019ve tried the glossier face wash it is similar as in how gentle it is but this one has more or a gel consistency and lathers up more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great gentle cleanser! Your skin feels clean and refreshed without being stripped. I use it as the second step when I double cleanse. Will buy this product again. I wish it had a cap so I could travel with it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i don't know why this was so different for me, but i felt it really stripped my skin and left it feeling tight and super dry--in the middle of a nj humid summer. i felt it lathered too much for a gentle cleanser. i was really excited for this, but just can't do it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser.  It is very gentle yet effective.  It is great for my sensitive skin.  My skin feels clean, but not stripped dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle and hydrating to my sensitive skin while also taking off all my makeup.  It never made my skin irritated or dry.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing facial cleanser. It did not strip my skin and caused no break outs. All my make up was removed as well. My skin did not feel tight but actually felt extremely hydrated and soft. I could not recommend more!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the deluxe sample of this cleanser. Used about 2 weeks & overall I love how this doesnu2019t feel dry after washing my face. It feels clean without feeling it stripped me of any moisture. I would recommend to anyone thatu2019s interested!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It is gentle enough for my sensitive skin, and leaves it feeling clean and hydrated.  I barely have to use a full pump of product, so it will last me a long time. It also has a very delicate scent that is barely noticeable, and produces a light foam when applied. I will definitely be repurchasing this cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Leaves my skin feeling soft & takes my makeup off!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how much I liked this cleanser. I figured it wouldnu2019t be able to get my make up off in full, but it suds up super well and it truly takes my make up off. I often have dry feeling skin after I wash my face with other cleansers but after using this one I was pleasantly surprised that my skin felt soft! Definitely recommend this product and will be buying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. The texture is gel like and not stripping at all. I love that it doesnu2019t smell like harsh chemicals. It left my face feeling super clean, soft and moisturized. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Just what I was hoping for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect gentle cleanser for sensitive skin. I love that it still lathers and leaves my skin feeling clean rather than feeling like you are washing your face with lotion like many gentle cleansers. No harsh scent and doesnu2019t strip my face. Highly recommend to anyone looking to switch to a clean face routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice gentle cleanser.  I like the low lather as I know it is not stripping my skin.  Cleans off my makeup and sunscreen. Like all Herbivore products I love the glass packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is very mild and gentle but does itu2019s job. It smells very lightly of roses if any scent at all. Does well at removing the minimal eye make up that I wear daily. After use- my skin still feels hydrated and not striped of moisture at all. Only have been using it since it came out a couple of weeks ago so I feel itu2019s too early to speak of how itu2019s helped reduce breakout or redness however, it hasnu2019t appeared to make anything worse!  Prior to starting this cleanser- I was using Glossiers milky jelly cleanser and can compare it to that. Similar in texture and light scent - but itu2019s easier for myself to walk in to Sephora and pick this up since I already work in the mall. Excited that Herbivore has produced their own cleanser and I look forward to what they put out next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser felt perfect. It felt smooth, slippery, and instantly soothing on my sensitive skin. It spread easily and the slip lasted a long time..I was able to cleanse thoroughly and gently, and even give my skin a mini massage without any irritation. It rinsed away completely and left my skin feeling so soft and clean. I loved it and am so happy I bought it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea, and this cleanser may be the only one I have found that does not leave the skin on my face feeling tight. It has a very light, natural scent (not a cloying rose scent but rather a refreshing one), and a tiny bit goes a long way. I also like that the bottle is not plastic, and I especially love that Herbivore is vegan and cruelty-free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so lightweight yet it works so well. My skin is tight and smooth afterwards. I have oily skin and i use this one in the morning. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser. I received it as a sample with my last HERBIVORE purchase and it is everything I have been looking for in a cleanser. After using it, my skin feels clean, hydrated, and ready for the remainder of my skincare routine. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: been using for about a week now and itu2019s just an amazing gentle cleanser that does not leave your skin dry and tight! I have not had any breakouts and love to use this in the morning. an added bonus is the pretty packaging. I use one pump and that is plenty to remove any leftover serums from the night before. I would definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great for dry skin! i go camping often, and went to a particularly high altitude area the other weekend. my skin got super dry the first day out there - the cleanser helped my skin adjust much faster with no other changes in my routine! i usually use yttp's superfood cleanser. i think i will be interchanging the two vegan, glass packaged cleansers as the seasons/my environment changes :) this cleanser has been sensitive friendly enough that substituting it out has had no negative effects! i personally prefer a little bit more foam than this guy (hence the yttp cleanser as my regular cleanser) - but it helped save my skin in the dryer climate and higher altitude. what a great addition to the herbivore line!
Love this face wash! I received a sample with another order and I will definitely be ordering the full size. Leaves your skin feeling soft, clean and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best around. My skin feels plump, cleansed, and hydrated (never that tight feeling that some of the harsher cleansers leave you with). Light, delicious smell. Perfect for combo/oily skin. Buy it! I swear you won't regret it. <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you havenu2019t added this product to your skincare routine then add it now. I purchased this product the day it launched because itu2019s vegan, clean, and non toxic. Plus letu2019s be honest the color is so beautiful! I have oily/combination skin and this cleanser was very gentle on my skin. The formula is amazing and really left my skin feeling smooth, silky, soft and glowing the very next day. I am so happy I purchased this product and I am definitely going to be repurchasing it again. If you want SILKY SOFT MOISTERIZED SKIN add to your cart sister!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fine...I think you pay for the aesthetic and Herbivore name. I like the minimal lather but it smells a bit like plastic. The texture seems like gel but then went slimy on my face before lathering (2 pumps is enough). It washes off pretty easily and then my skin was left with a squeaky texture even while in the shower--not quite dry/tight, but not moisturized either. It will do for now, but for those into gel cleansers, I still favor Mario Badescu's enzyme cleanser (better cost, smell, feeling).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. I would say half a pump would best. I used a full pump and boy did that lather to a bubbly mess fast. Besides my accidental pump overdose-the cleanser provided a wonderful cleanse. I didn't notice any dryness; but then again I ALWAYS moisturize after washing. Thumbs up in my book. Seems like the perfect trio-added to my blue tansy mask and lapis oil regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible smell and not too much product. The packaging is nice but the product itself gives me acne and does nothing special for my skin that a makeup wipe would'nt do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really happy with my Herbivore cleanser. I received it as a sample with the Blue Lapis oil and I will be buying a regular size. I really love how light it is and how it gently cleanses. My skin felt really soft after the first time I used it. The texture is also very nice.  I see a difference in my skin after just using it for a week. Herbivore has wonderful products and you definitely get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! Itu2019s just the right amount of creamy that makes it lovely to deal with and a great texture. When I run out, I will be buying again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample with my Lapis oil (which I LOVE) and Iu2019ve been using it every other day for about two weeks. When I have very sweaty or dirty skin (post workout, Texas humidity) itu2019s a wonderful cleanser. If I used it daily it would be too drying, so I alternate with Glossier milky jelly cleanser. This one does do a great job of removing makeup, not 100% for some stubborn mascara (not waterproof) but still great for a jelly cleanser. I would have it as a second cleansing option when I need something slightly more powerful than a gentle milky jelly. Also the scent is lovely, not too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleaner! Has the perfect amount of foam and doesnu2019t dry your face out. Leaves your face feeling clean and refreshed. Would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with an order of a mask. This cleanser was okay. Not sure if I would order it on my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd put this product on a par with my gold-standard - Fresh Soy cleanser. It's got a stronger smell than that product (rose scent), but goes on like a gel and washes completely clean without stripping skin in any way. The scent actually grew on me a lot after a few days and I'm thinking I might swap out my Fresh for this after my current tube runs out. Really good product from a great company!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty in colour and packaging is gorgeous. Scent is a bit cosmetic and medical in comparison to the aesthetic. Texture isnu2019t bad as far as cleansers go but I expected it to be thicker, because it says u201ccreamy jellyu201d cleanser. Feels good on your face and rinses fairly easily, my skin is combination so it got dry in certain spots but worked well for the oily parts of my skin, leaving those spots feeling more balanced. Not a bad product overall but didnu2019t work for combination skin.

reviews.review_title: It really feels like a pillowy cloud!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely delicate rose scent and lovely texture. Removes make up/dirt efficiently without leaving my skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is perfect if you like a light cleanser that gets the job done without being harsh. I am confident in using this everyday without drying out my skin. It has a great scent and the signature chic package of Herbivore. I know I will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love herbivore's new jelly cleanser! It's super gentle and very effective in removing all traces of makeup. Leaves my skin soft and hydrated. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a new face cleanser because I haven't found one that has consistently been good to my skin so I was happy to find out that Herbivore was coming out with one! I was apart of their testing team before the product launched and I was honored to have tried it out! I've been using this face cleanser for about 1 month now and I can genuinely say it is the BEST face cleanser I have ever used! I haven't experienced any breakouts since using this product, it instantly makes your skin feel soft and smooth, and I love this product especially because after every use your skin never feels dry or dried out from using it, your skin will feel moisturized. Overall this is a great facial cleanser and I would recommend buying it because you won't be disappointed!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It has a great creamy texture that leaves my skin feeling clean and moisturized, I hate how some cleansers make you feel dry. I dove right in on using it b/c all their products have reacted very well with my skin. I even caught my husband using it in the shower lol. It doesn't hurt that it smells so good too! I use this then the Orchid Face Oil for amazing results (and amazing smells). I really don't have enough good things to say about this product or this brand. I love, love, love Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another winner from herbivore! Smells divine and leaves your skin feeling clean without feeling stripped, my skin feels bouncy and soft! Love the glass bottle as well. I use this with lapis and prism and my skin is soft and helps prevent breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is a nice feeling, a little slimy. Very similar texture to the fresh soy face cleanser. While it is better at removing makeup than the fresh soy cleanser, I really wouldn't call this a makeup removing cleanser. After using eye makeup remover, I still find myself cleansing 2-3 times with this or turning to another cleanser to finish the job. I do enjoy that this one of of very few cleansers that doesn't burn my eyes though. Nice size heavy glass bottle, even though it's 1 oz less than the Innisfree, it seems like the same amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is prone to acne breakouts and a lot of cleansers actually irritate my skin and make my acne worse. I decided to try this cleanser since I received it as a sample and other Herbivore products have been amazing, and this hasn't irritated my skin at all. After over a week of trying it out (along with Herbivore masks), my skin looks and feels better than it has in years. The cleanser leaves my face feeling so hydrated and looking bright, and doesn't dry it out like some other cleansers. I look forward to washing my face with it every morning and evening. This is definitely now a staple in my skincare routine. I genuinely recommend anyone who has skin that is easily irritated to try any of Herbivore's products, especially this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mainly use all clean products.  Herbivore products have become a new staple in my regimen.  This cleanser is lightweight and washes off of my makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle, moisturizing cleanser. It doesn't strip the skin but still feels clean. I have oily, acne prone skin and this did not break me out. I have not used it to remove makeup so I don't know how well it works for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore products have quickly become a personal favorite. I already use their Orchid oil and Prism, as well as their Coconut Sea Spray (for my hair). I tried this and realized my Herbivore habit just got even more expensive. This cleanser is wonderful! It doesn't take a lot, but the results are ideal. It's gentle, effective and leaves my skin happy. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Great new cleanser for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 2 weeks and love it. You only need a tiny amount. It cleans thoroughly without drying my sensitive skin. Very light scent which is perfect/non-irritating. I have the full line of Herbivore skin care products and love them all - including this new cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I was nervous about trying this face wash because my skin is so sensitive. However, I took the jump and I am so glad that I did! My skin didnu2019t react at all and itu2019s a great cleaner at a reasonable price point. I am a big fan of herbivore products and this face wash is no different!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with dry, red skin, even in the summertime, and most cleansers just exacerbate the issue. I'm usually forking over $40 plus for a cleanser that won't send my skin into eczemaville, and when I saw that Herbivore had a creamy cleanser for under $25, I of course had to try it, and I received my bottle when my skin was trying to heal itself after a mysterious rash made my face, neck and hands super red and itchy. While the cleanser wasn't responsible for clearing up my rashes, it certainly soothed it and helped my skin retain the moisture it so badly craves. I've found my new cleanser. Thank you Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is really good for those who want a very gentle cleanser, really functions well as a primary cleanser! It is good for removing makeup, sunscreen, and debris from the face. I go in with an acne scrub afterwards, so it was important to me that this cleanser be gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used this once but my face already feels so soft! Excited to add this to my skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is super refreshing and very gentle. Smells amazing too! I am so happy to have a cleanser from this company - I love knowing all the ingredients are natural & keeping my beauty routine clean. Love all their skincare products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this Cleanser! So light and creamy and makes my skin feel so soft and clean!! Pairs beautifully with herbivores lapis oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Pink Cloud Jelly Cleanser as a sample with my Herbivore order and I am ditching my previous cleanser immediately. Pink Cloud is gentle, but gets the job done! It provides my skin with the perfect moisture balance and leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! Itu2019s effective but not stripping. I really feel like it removes my sunscreen and oil after a long day of wearing a mask. I have acne prone and sensitive skin for some context. I would absolutely buy this again (also it doesnu2019t hurt that it smells great and is non toxic).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my 50u2019s and right now my skin is acting very weird because of wearing a mask all day as I am in healthcare and itu2019s mandatory.  My teenage daughter and I both love this cleanser.  My skin is dry and sensitive and hers is on the oily side.  This cleanser is amazing and works well for both of us.  Smells fabulous, you only need a few pumps to wash your entire face so it lasts a long time, and the price is very reasonable.  It removes makeup and still makes your skin feel buttery soft.  Seriously the best!  We love Herbivore products!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser. I love the glass bottle and the minimalist approach to the design. Iu2019m a huge stan of herbivore and this new jelly cleanser doesnu2019t disappoint. It smells clean and is free of fragrance. Iu2019ve been using for only a week so thatu2019s why I didnu2019t give it 5 stars. Need more time to see how my skin reacts.   Plus you get a lot of product and the price is affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this cleanser with my order and was SO excited to try it! I use so many Herbivore products already and always wished they had a jelly cleanser. Wish granted! It's mild, smells great, and feels so clean on my skin. Great for washing off mascara and blush at the end of a long day. I like to use this as a first cleanse. I highly recommend it to anyone with sensitive skin or someone who wants to have a spa-like experience at home every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is gentle and thorough and leaves my skin soft instead of squeaky. An A+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received a free sample of this with my order. i love love love the consistency of this. It's so gentle on the skin and smells really good. also really like that it's fragrance free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is LOVELY!  I have never found anything better for SO gently washing away gel eyeliner from the under-eye area.  This product will forevermore be in my Necessary collection of facial products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd just about given up hope on a cleanser from Hervbivore! This product lives up to it's Pink Cloud counter parts. My sensitive skin is very happy with it. The delicate rose scent makes getting ready for bed feel luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For someone who does not wear a lot of makeup I cannot speak to the m/u removal aspect of the cleanser. However, my skin has been incredibly sensitive during my pregnancy and this cleanser is gentle enough where my skin did not react after usingu2014yay! I am a fan of Herbivore products in general and use the Pink Clay bar soap on face & body in the shower, so this is a great cleanser for my facial routine via sink or on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! The texture feels amazing and it's very hydrating. I hate cleansers that dry me out and this does not! I also really enjoy the light rosy smell. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great brand with another amazing product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love herbivore. This cleanser is everything I expected it to be, non-stripping and effective. It is gentle enough to use with stronger products like an AHA BHA serum at night, and leaves your skin looking fresh and clean in the morning. I highly recommend this product I think it is great quality and worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a generous sample of this product from Herbivore. I must say I am very impressed by this cleanser. It is gently yet effective, the scent is divine. It didnu2019t strip my skin and left it feeling clean and soft. A little goes a long way making the price point very reasonable. I definitely recommend giving this a try. In my opinion it will work for most skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As an avid Herbivore user, I've been DYING for a non-bar cleanser from them for ages! So thrilled with this one. It's light, yet removed all my makeup, including mascara. Skin feels plump and fresh afterwards. So happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great creamy soft texture without feeling greasy. Very little product needed to feel clean. Did not remove eye makeup as hoped though. Would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t typically use cleansers out of a bottle for waste reduction reasons, but I couldnu2019t resist trying out Herbivoreu2019s new cleanser. Itu2019s light, soft on my sensitive skin, and smells delightful. This is a great overall cleanser and wonu2019t aggravate sensitive/maturing/eczema-prone skin (my skin in a nutshell). Since the products Herbivore makes are sustainable and natural, itu2019s a no-brainer to use their amazing products.

reviews.review_text: Herbivore has been my go-to skincare product for years, and they did it again with the Pink Cloud Cleanser! I received a free trial size from Herbivore, and loved it enough to purchase the full sized product. This cleanser is lightweight, non-stripping, and so effective at removing the day. I work outside in Alabama -a humidity nightmare- and the summer heat plus buildup from wearing a mask can leave my face feeling so *gross* at the end of the day. But with this cleanser, I can go to bed at night with my face feeling oh so clean! If you have sensitive skin, I would definitely recommend giving this product a try.

reviews.review_title: It does what it says itu2019ll do

reviews.review_text: Herbivore included a trial size of this cleanser with my order because it hadnu2019t officially been released yet. Iu2019ve tried the cleanser nightly when I wash the sticky summer day off my face for about 2 weeks now and already know Iu2019m ordering it on my next purchase. I hadnu2019t read the details about it except that the bottle says creamy jelly cleanser. Thatu2019s exactly what it feels like and even thought how great it is to use a cleanser that doesnu2019t strip my face of everything it needs. Then I read the details and it says it wonu2019t strip the face! I havenu2019t used it with makeup on but can already tell from the texture that itu2019ll help makeup slide right off. No harsh scent either. Forgot to mention I usually wake up with a breakout on my nose or chin when itu2019s humid out but that hasnu2019t happened since I started using this cleanser nightly. Thank you for existing Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of this when I realized that it was a jelly cleanser, as I have rosacea and seborrheic dermatitis, and jelly/balm/oil cleansers generally make both of these issues worse for me because of the residue they leave behind.   Imagine my surprise when this cleanser removed all my makeup and sunscreen in one go, and I didnu2019t feel like I had to cleanse again afterward! This product left my skin feeling clean, but not squeaky clean like a true foaming cleanser. No residue or traces of makeup left behind. I follow up with Herbivoreu2019s Rose Hibiscus Face mist, and then the rest of my routine. Iu2019ve noticed since using the two products together, the acne I get on my chin from wearing a mask 12 hours a day, while still there, is definitely less red, inflamed, and flaky.

reviews.review_text: I usually don't write reviews for anything (or post photos of myself) but this is such a beautiful face-wash and I had to share.   The packaging and the product itself is very lux feeling for it's price as it is glass and the color of the product is a beautiful shimmering light pink. Granted, I have used it once since I just got it, but the instant results has been very hydrating and non-stripping. The smell is interesting, but not off-putting at all. It's just the raw and clean ingredients shining through. There is no lid, but a twist on the pump to either stop the product from coming out or allowing it to be pushed down and out.   The product itself is very creamy (not foamy) and I LOVED gently rubbing it into my skin. I feel this product will be best for people with dry and sensitive skin. I would even recommend this for my grandma with aged skin.   I love this face wash!

Brands of the same price range often use plastic which feels low quality and harms the environment. This bottle is heavy and feels luxurious! Overall Iu2019d highly recommend this product. :)
